1.content:
Hello, I'm Taprix, a dimension hopper and keeper of balance. Unfortunately, that balance has been greatly shifted. Not too long ago a witch by the name Selena Herin preformed a devastating ritual. By offering 100 souls she was given the power to alter the reality of her world to how she saw fit, the results were catastrophic. She begun by making herself the ruler of her world, next she prevented the chance of a revolt by making men infantile and meek, changing the social norm so that men remain in diapers for life. To ensure that no women could ever overthrow her she eliminated a large majority of the female populous.

Her lust for power didn't stop there, I tried to stop her but my presents only seemed to light an even brighter fire in her, she was no longer contempt with being ruler of her world, she wants to rule the multiverse, she wishes every world in every dimension to suffer the same fate, she wishes to become the god of all worlds and prove her strength as the most powerful witch to ever live. In order to complete this though she must collect the souls of 1000 humans to offer as sacrifice, if she succeeds, no world will be safe from her wrath.

And as such, I am calling upon you, my chosen one. I will give you the power to inhabit anyone living in that world, you will become that person, adopting their memories, values, goals and personality. If you use this gift wisely you can stop Selena before she reaches her goal. But be careful, this is a one way trip, once you have chosen your host there is no changing.

So, who will you be? I trust you will make the right choice.

Selena Herin: The witch who altered reality. She is a single mother to a son and ruler of the world. She is a sick and twisted woman who's only desire is to conquer all. She has immense magic power.

Jesse Herin: Selena's 12-year-old son. Jesse grew up lonely as his mother never showed him any love. This has led him to feeling insignificant and desperate to have friends. He inherited mild magic from his mother but still doesn't quite grasp how to control it.

Francis Jewell: A superhero and arch enemy of Selena in the previous world, although he ultimately failed Selena wanted to make sure he wouldn't be a threat. She wasn't able to take away his powers but instead made him very submissive and a cry baby.

Kristine Marley: An aspirating artist who isn't overly pleased with how the world works. She lives a pretty decent life, she has her own apartment which doubles as an art studio, with a mum, dad and younger brother that she visits regularly. She uses a lot of her art to inspire people to live how they want and not follow the 'laws' but down by Selena.
1.title: A Multiverse In Grave Danger

13.content:
You awake to the same crib you've been stuck sleeping in ever since around when Selena began her great plan.

After sacrificing 100 souls, Selena was granted full power of the world, she first made herself ruler and soon enough after a couple of hours of demands from Selena it was clear she was not the leader the world needed which left you, Francis Jewell, the savior of earth! So there you were, called upon by public figures to stand in and stop Selena's oppressive control over the planet and so assuming this would be another effortless task you flew to her luxurious palace where she lounged on her elegant throne. As soon as you flew through the doors you were instantly flung to the floor by Selena and soon enough you found yourself falling through a hole in the floor!

It swiftly closed back up as you fell down into what looked like an adult sized highchair! As you landed in the infantile object you were quickly locked in! Looking around you noticed you were in a large glass box surrounded by large cameras that were live-streaming your capture! suddenly a voice came on the loud speakers!
"Hello there! My little guy, now be good boy and smile for the cameras as I show the rest of all the men that will try to tear me down what will be in store for them!" Selena tormented as a tv in front of you showed images of various toddler toys and a pair of headphones where strapped around your head, soon enough you had drifted off to sleep. When you finally awoke you found that you had almost no memory of your previous life, all that you knew now was that you were being held prisoner as Selena's baby boy!

And so as you look back on the last memories you have of being Francis Jewell the savior of the world, you realized that your diaper was soaked! So like usual you spat out your pacifier and bawled your eyes out until...
13.title: Francis Jewell

132.content:
Jesse, for his part, seemed to think of you as a younger sibling of sorts.

"There we go, Francis." He says, bouncing you on his shoulder as he pats your back before realizing that you were wet (normally, Selena came in). "Oh, let's get you changed."

He took you to the changing table to get you out of your wet diaper, and soon you were dry, before Francis took you downstairs to eat breakfast, which consisted of...
132.title: Jessie walked in.

15.content:
Karel Harkins: Francis's "sidekick" and assistant, in the previous world, a part-time wizard specializing in healing and enhancing magic. In the new world, he's a whiny 3 year old who is in Pull-Ups.

Tanya Elish: A young 13 year old girl who's older brother was turned into an infant in the new world. She wants to start a rebellion against Selena, but she needs some help-which is where a magic amulet comes in.

Raymond Banks: Before the world reset, Raymond was a 18 year old delinquent who used his (comparatively small) fire magic to commit minor crimes. After breaking Selena's rules, he was transformed into a 4 year old and in diapers, and he wants to get back to normal.

Yu "Yuri" Nito: A young Japanese man, 21, who disguised himself as a girl in order to get around the diaper thingy. Secretly has a mysterious and uncontrolled magic powered by "fate" and "destiny".
15.title: Someone Else

info.brief_description: Are you a Hero, a Witch or a Diaper Boy?
info.description:
When an evil witch twists reality to her will, making herself ruler of all and all men infantile, it's up to a special chosen one to stop her. But was the chosen one fit for the role or do they have a dark side?


Rules:

No excessive swearing, mild swearing is allowed.

No explicit sex scenes and absolutely no sex involving minors.

The story can be in either first, second or third person but once a story has begun keep it to how it started.


Have Fun
